title: Privacy Policy
intro: This Privacy Policy explains how PlaylistWizard (“we”, “us”, “our”) collects, uses, and protects personal data when you use our web application (“App”).

security.title: Security of Data
security.content: We take your privacy seriously. While we use commercially acceptable methods to protect your data, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

disclosure.title: Disclosures of Data
disclosure.content: We do not store your Google or Spotify data. We do not sell or disclose any information to third parties, except in response to formal legal procedures.

google-analytics.title: Use of Google Analytics
google-analytics.content-1: We use Google Analytics to understand usage patterns of the App. This includes:
google-analytics.content-2: Google Analytics collects only your IP address (used on the day of your visit), which is anonymized and not combined with personally identifiable information. A persistent cookie may be used to distinguish you as a returning user. You may disable cookies in your browser to prevent this tracking.
